body:
I'm not in anyway unhappy with the brilliant games and ideas that are already provided.

Anyway, I don't know if any of you guys remember when there was such a thing as the "Sand Stone Lobby" era. It had SO MANY More Games! Ghost Squads, Parkour , Survival games , sky wars, the list goes on and on. My favourite had to be Ghost Squads. Now when we re-enter the present we're in a stone lobby with so many slots for games, but are empty!

Avicade, Elimination and CTH are barly used!! Why not re-add the games that had once made Avicus such a popular, unique server.

-FLuroKiTTeh, loyal member of the Avicus Network

replies.body:
You can only call a server unique when they don't care about other servers and don't follow servers. That they do what they think is right or what they like.
Which is adding the type of game modes they want.

If more people are leaving or joining we could make new ones from fan based ideas, which I see no harm in that. Although a lot of people who'd want that game mode would need to keep requesting for the mods/admins to accept it to be allowed in the server.
